programDescription: JSR - application for determining the appropriate Java version for Minecraft.
author: Author
javaReasonModern: Modern Minecraft versions (1.17+) require Java 17 or newer for optimal performance and compatibility.
javaReasonMiddle: Minecraft versions 1.13-1.16.5 work best with Java 8-11.
javaReasonLegacy: Legacy Minecraft versions (1.7.10-1.12.2) are optimized for Java 8.
javaReasonVeryOld: Very old Minecraft versions (1.0-1.6.4) require Java 6 or 7.
javaReasonSnapshot: This snapshot version requires the specified Java version for proper functionality.
javaReasonBeta: Minecraft Beta versions work best with Java 6 or 7.
javaReasonAlpha: Minecraft Alpha versions require Java 5 or 6.
javaReasonDefault: Based on the version you entered, we recommend this Java version.
javaReasonLatestRelease: The latest Minecraft release requires Java 17 or newer.
javaReasonLatestSnapshot: The latest Minecraft snapshot requires Java 17 or newer.
